text: you can feel for yourself how hot it is
people avoid coming out in this weather
and nobody gives us work if someone
gives me work I would work even in this
heat because if I don't I won't be able
to put food on the table I sometimes
feel dizzy because of the heat a little
while ago
I was about to collapse it's so hot that
I can barely speak what can I say
we sometimes have to take the fast out
here in this heat with all this heat
there are also electricity curves and
there is extreme shortage of water what
can we do without water and then there
is no work for us we sit here all day
without work and go back home in the
evening and then we come back again next
morning it's not like old times now we
used to have a lot of work during the
month of ramadhan people would come
around and give us juices and drinks to
break the fast now no one cares about us
